channel.title: Stigma on Disconnected
channel.description: Recent content in Stigma on Disconnected

item.title: Dysphoria Continued: NSFW
item.description: Limbo For the past few days I’ve found myself in a sort of uncomfortable limbo, stuck between the want to abandon a gender which offers me little comfort, and identity I have no connection to, or to stick with my current gender in fear of the social stigmas I may face. Stuck between a rock and a hard place, uncertain what to do. Trapped Ironically, it’s not my sexual organs that bring my discomfort when it comes to my gender.
